5. 综合题

出不动了, 一道题, 再见.

 1auto main() -> int {
 2  static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "r", .dtor = "t"}};
 3  Printer c2{Info{.ctor = "a", .dtor = "o"}};
 4  {
 5    Printer* c3 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "t"}};
 6    Printer* c4 = nullptr;
 7    static Printer c5{Info{.ctor = "g", .dtor = "l"}};
 8  }
 9  {
10    Printer* c6 = nullptr;
11    { Printer{Info{.ctor = "e", .dtor = "s"}}; }
12    { Printer* c8 = nullptr; }
13    c6           = new Printer{Info{.ctor = ":", .dtor = "i"}};
14    Printer* c9  = nullptr;
15    Printer* c10 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = ":", .dtor = "o"}};
16    delete c6;
17    {
18      c9 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "l"}};
19      static Printer c11{Info{.ctor = "_", .dtor = "u"}};
20      {
21        Printer* c12 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "f", .dtor = "h"}};
22        delete c10;
23        delete new Printer{Info{.ctor = "u", .dtor = "n"}};
24      }
25      Printer c14{Info{.ctor = "d", .dtor = "_"}};
26      static Printer c15{Info{.ctor = "_", .dtor = "s"}};
27      Printer* c16 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "r", .dtor = ":"}};
28      static Printer c17{Info{.ctor = "e", .dtor = "e"}};
29      static Printer c18{Info{.ctor = "s", .dtor = "r"}};
30      static Printer c19{Info{.ctor = "u", .dtor = "_"}};
31      delete c9;
32      static Printer c20{Info{.ctor = "t", .dtor = "d"}};
33      Printer* c21 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = ":", .dtor = "u"}};
34      delete c16;
35      delete new Printer{Info{.ctor = "o", .dtor = "p"}};
36      Printer{Info{.ctor = "e", .dtor = "r"}};
37      static Printer c24{Info{.ctor = "a", .dtor = "n"}};
38      Printer* c25 = nullptr;
39      c25          = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "t", .dtor = "s"}};
40      Printer* c26 = nullptr;
41      Printer c27{Info{.ctor = "o", .dtor = "r"}};
42    }
43    {
44      Printer* c28 = new Printer{Info{.ctor = "i", .dtor = "a"}};
45      delete new Printer{Info{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "_"}};
46    }
47    static Printer c30{Info{.ctor = "f", .dtor = "u"}};
48  }
49}

点击查看……提示？

49 个字符, ranges 库中用于返回值的结构体, 包含 “输入迭代器” 和 “是否找到” 数据成员.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 47zEPz81h], 答案: ranges::in_found_result::operator_in_found_result.
